TopicTitle: Boba2007 is launching into the forums!

Articles.Content:
That was the best joke I could think of for the title ???

Anyways, I come here not from the yogscast, but kurtjmac. I just purchased my pre-order, but have yet to play it due to the download problems you\'ve probably already read about. Looking forward to spending time at the forums, and hopefully the site-slowness issues are fixed soon!

Edit: Well that\'s ironic, the slowness issues seemed to have been fixed the second I posted this! I don\'t think the download is working for me yet though.

Edit2: I found a mediafire mirror download that worked, playing and having fun!
Welcome to the forums! I don\'t think the slowness will go away anytime soon. It\'s been like this(atleast for me anyway) for the last few days.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

If you join us on IRC at #ksp on irc.quakenet.org, someone can probably hook you up with a download for the file.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Welcome to the forums!

Have a donut.
